subject: Recordings and Downloads (Video)
Football
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell said he will run out of patience at some point while waiting to Matt Walsh to reveal what he knows about New England’s videotaping practices.
snippet: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell said he will run out of patience at some point while waiting to Matt Walsh to reveal what he knows about New England’s videotaping practices.
